EmailTemplate.name: RE: $15,000 off Turbo for MCPS (1495455058.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: $15,000 off Turbo for MCPS (1495455058.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Bob, With the large investment the infrastructure team at MCPS has made in virtualization, I was hoping that my team and I could get the chance to show you why large tech companies like BMC, EMC and HPE choose to use Turbonomic to increase application performance while also allowing them to realize the true capacity of their infrastructures. To quote BMC CIO, Scott Crowder, “”Once we brought Turbonomic into our infrastructure and turned it on we actually saw a 25% increase in overall capacity. Not only that - the performance went through the roof.” See more in the video below. Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5YdMHJKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAk%2DhTzTtlKmUf4xCfLFh%5FNdo66m2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXYpwghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSdql6620%5Fo2wCUGGVUsPjJ00iSKKxzoeRQtnh20UkKStmjzS%5FukYUomHUC%2DNkltBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DOOR%5Ftjmim25gVMk7QhiekStxkXkj4qRT96qothamPH%5FrCHXzoh2N0QuIA9A7kUbDmNIV4hDgCw7vyMFza3L0BPPsjlS0YcnUvnIVE6EPG4Y%2C/j01QeM3JL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UvVzuX9lmUcNUBmSE6h5EKxZmxd5W113rlp2bV%5FT3WE0Nz6JKYwGmvFbBfvP4As3QjrQMCOLPS]]> The promotion mentioned below for $15,000 off Turbo offer still stands. Do you have 30 minutes over the next couple of weeks for an introduction? Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2017 10:07 AM To: 'bob_straus@mcpsmd.org' <bob_straus@mcpsmd.org> Subject: $15,000 off Turbo for MCPS Bob - I’m reaching out with a special offer for state and local government organizations as we approach the summer months. I’ve worked with a number of governmental institutions including the Virginia Beach City Public Schools, and Fairfax County Public Schools to alleviate their IT infrastructure management challenges. They generally run within a June/July budget cycle and occasionally have remaining funds towards the end of their fiscal year. I typically find that our SLED customers end up installing Turbo in their environment because of our ability to: - Reduce ongoing compute/storage costs by 20-30% by optimizing workload placement - Reduce operational costs of problem and incident management by eliminating complex problems with disk space and IO performance contention - Assure application performance and reduce risk by minimizing the contention for CPU, Mem, disk space and IO capacity - Enable more IO-intensive applications to be virtualized reliably, bringing down the overall cost to deliver compute services to the business and customers Turbonomic directly addresses these challenges through our intelligent automation, enabling teams to increase the infrastructure’s capacity and the performance of the applications they run (see more in link in signature). With that in mind, we’d like to offer a $15,000 discount for any deal with us, if you install Turbonomic’s autonomic performance platform before the end of May. Do you have 30 minutes for my team and I to provide an introduction to you and the team at Montgomery County Public Schools over the next couple of weeks? Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEtQcc3LKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhfBEONSy%5FtgbTJT4BNYad%2D2I9u7a%5FjzWkB943El0TYG05TbUVFNAC1R6YZ1jHsAKQKDS6d%5FiPDAqEzng8Ejo0w%5F8CRd7u%2D1X6R4mjxxWWjEHhpyuWT4nOfXZFEge5Vk3Ud%5F2oSRPnY1w%5FK77EQsBwypfVZhzE88NtIOcs6sEqIUwL33rfVWuw8TqaLwrumjdUbPh06oZMsdjfFKGyeGrPKIDZ32T3drzg3aBFKA2F2Lc45vzOnq0FXTuw4bhatoSR7w1UsjLFw%2D9jchAm8NSWseWY%2C/j0lWdcbJL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMJVXlQ5RFtKcOdJi%5FKdwJni8XzXcuJXeOpdDZZ8mivg0rYWw81YwucSrp3vlCEM7RzQ%5FQEPOTfwsiyriIt0qUQWV%2D2jVJ5IgiD0agPAH2YG%5Fbg%2C%2C]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEtQcc3LKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhfBEONSy%5FtgbTJT4BNYad%2D2I9u7a%5FjzWkB943El0TYG05TbUVFNAC1R6YZ1jHsAKQKDS6d%5FiPDAqEzng8Ejo0w%5F8CRd7u%2D1X6R4mjxxWWjEHhpyuWT4nOfXZFEge5Vk3Ud%5F2oSRPnY1w%5FK77EQsBwypfVZhzE88NtIOcs6sEqIUwL33rfVWuw8TqaLwrumjdUbPh06oZMsdjfFKGyeGrPKIDZ32T3drzg3aBFKA2F2Lc45vzOnq0FXTuw4bhatoSR7w1UsjLFw%2D9jchAm8NSWseWY%2C/h0xRd8DHdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCxToNGOmZTokFqNdbWWyfYTX4joLiW4kba7ln95Q3xv339XUunOiRi3X5LmYPTERrIVW5LOwE]]>
